targets.query: SELECT last("float") FROM "rivian" WHERE ("sensor" = 'energy_storage/voltage_pack/V_pack_f_DCFC_contactor') GROUP BY time(1s) fill(previous)
SELECT last("int") FROM "rivian" WHERE ("sensor" = 'energy_storage/charger/EMS_charger_evse_current_present') GROUP BY time(1s) fill(previous)
SELECT last("float") FROM "rivian" WHERE ("sensor" = 'energy_storage/voltage_pack/V_pack_f_main_contactor') GROUP BY time(1s) fill(previous)
SELECT last("float") FROM "rivian" WHERE ("sensor" = 'energy_storage/current/pack_current_high_speed') GROUP BY time(1s) fill(previous)
SELECT last("float") FROM "rivian" WHERE ("sensor" = 'energy_storage/temperature_cell/T_cell_estimated_avg') GROUP BY time(1s) fill(previous)
SELECT last("float") FROM "rivian" WHERE ("sensor" = 'energy_storage/temperature_cell/T_cell_measured_avg') GROUP BY time(1s) fill(previous)
